fields.description:
Just over night, without changing anything, I got this error:

An internal error occurred during: "Retrieving platform status...".
org.json.simple.JSONObject cannot be cast to org.json.simple.JSONArray

Trying to repair with sudo xcode-select -switch <xcode_folder_path> doesnâ€™t work at all

comments.body:
Hello Joachim Mollin,
Thanks for your concern. For iOS configuration please try this following. 
At first open your Xcode  and run a sample native project if it runs successfully then open your studio preference, go to Preferences > Studio > Platforms > iOS and check Xcode is available or not.

If it not available then write this following command through the terminal 
sudo sudo xcode-select -switch <xcode_folder_path>
Please take a look our documentation for more details:
http://docs.appcelerator.com/platform/latest/#!/guide/Configuring_XCode_inside_Studio

Hope it helps.
